General.Name: Sino-American Silicon Products
General.Description: Sino-American Silicon Products Inc. engages in the design, production, and sale of semi-conductor silicon materials and components, rheostat, and optical and communications wafer materials. The company operates through Semiconductor and Solar Energy segments. It provides multi-crystalline silicon materials, pseudo square mono crystalline wafers, multi crystalline wafers, and solar cells and modules. The company also offers technology and management consulting services; and technical services for the photo-voltaic power system generation and installation. In addition, it is involved in the solar cell manufacturing; sale and wholesale of electronic materials; power generation; processing and trading of ingots and wafers; investment activities; and trading of epitaxy foundry. It operates in Taiwan, Japan, Korea, the United States, Italy, the Philippines, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.8, Industrial East Road 2, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
